title: Making sense of the latest rumors about Apple’s looming AR and Mixed Reality headsets
content:
Apple is likely to enter a new product category with headsets in the near future. So far, there are two rumored products: the AR headset and the Mixed Reality headset, usually called AR/VR headset or “Apple Glasses.” With rumors gaining traction about these products, here’s what we know so far about each of them.

more…

The post Making sense of the latest rumors about Apple’s looming AR and Mixed Reality headsets appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple could introduce in 2022 a new product category. Here's what we know so far about the rumored Mixed Reality headset and the AR headset.
